subject: Re: [junit] Re: Customize Parameterized class report?
msgSnippet: El, Thanks for posting your solution.  I d love to make it so that kind of customization is easier in the future.  Would you mind posting a feature request on
messageBody:
El,

Thanks for posting your solution. I'd love to make it so that kind of
customization is easier in the future. Would you mind posting a feature
request on SourceForge, so we can look at it for an upcoming release?
Thanks,

David Saff

On 4/27/07, e.younes <eyounesde@...> wrote:
>
> Thanks David.
>
> I didn't found the patch yet but I solved it that way:
>
> I copied the sourcecode of Parameterized.java and changed only this
> line of code:
>
>
> return String.format("[%s]", fParameterSetNumber);
>
> into this one
>
> return String.format("[%s] - %s", fParameterSetNumber, fParameters
> [fParameters.length - 1].toString());
>
> And I used my new Runner instead of Parameterized.class
> That means the last Parameter on each TestCase is the name.
>
>
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
>
>
>
>


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
